name: Monster Match: Match 2 Game
description:
Match the two same monsters as fast as you can. Race against the clock, play for the highest accuracy, challenge your friends. Record high scores for both accuracy and time on every game type, size and theme.

Levels :

Over 70 levels.

Multiple Board Sizes:

board sizes from 6x2 to 6x6

Cool Graphics:

All new graphics developed for the iPhone and iPad.

Settings:

Check out the Settings App to turn sound effects on and off.

Compatibility:

This game requires iOS 10+.
